metadata.title: Jessica London Women's Plus Size Boatneck Tunic Long Knit 3/4 Sleeve Shirt
features: PLUS SIZING: Size 18 / 20 will fit Plus sizes 18 to 20
A casually sophisticated knit top with gold tone buttons on the shoulders and in the perfect length. Three-quarter sleeves. Side slits.

ABOUT THE BRAND: Style To Live By. Jessica London specializes in head-to-toe women’s plus size clothing outfitting that works for you—work days, special days, every day. Our classic designs come in plus sizes for women and offer easy, day-to-night versatility. Our professional collection keeps pace with your busy life. Plus, the most covetable accessories allow you to spin your look into something totally unique. After all, you can achieve anything - if you’re dressed for it!
description: A casually sophisticated knit top with gold tone buttons on the shoulders and in the perfect length. Three-quarter sleeves. Side slits.  30" long Cotton/spandexMachine wash; imported  Style & Fit Tips:  This timeless boatneck tunic is a staple in everyday essential for every body. The universally flattering relaxed fit is easy to dress up or down for any occasion, and the longer, tunic length eases over all of your favorite bottoms. Available in bright, bold hues, as well as pretty patterns and prints, you can wear this tunic everyday!
